TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sapifaca'_to_riko'_a_kikay, title = Sapifaca'_to_riko'_a_kikay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sapifaca'_to_riko'_a_kikay} }

S.FORM: Ira aca ko sapifaca' to riko' a kikay i loma' no tamdamdaw. Ano mifaca' to riko' i, patelien ho ko riko' ato safon. Misatapang a mifaca' to riko' koni kikay i, masadak ko nanom i pipatelian to riko', maliyon ko mo-ta. Ano maherek to a mifaca', dadawa a maliyon ko pipatelian a mi'icang to riko'. Ira ko tingnaw no sapifaca' to riko' a kikay imatini, mafana' a misa'osi to kareteng no riko' ato cikang no pifaca'an.

Ira aca ko sapifaca' to riko' a kikay i loma' no tamdamdaw. Ano mifaca' to riko' i, patelien ho ko riko' ato safon. Misatapang a mifaca' to riko' koni kikay i, masadak ko nanom i pipatelian to riko', maliyon ko mo-ta. Ano maherek to a mifaca', dadawa a maliyon ko pipatelian a mi'icang to riko'. Ira ko tingnaw no sapifaca' to riko' a kikay imatini, mafana' a misa'osi to kareteng no riko' ato cikang no pifaca'an.
